Class MobileSyncSDKManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.app.SalesforceSDKManager

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SalesforceHybridSDKManager, SalesforceReactSDKManager

    public class MobileSyncSDKManager
extends SmartStoreSDKManager
    SDK Manager for all native applications that use MobileSync.
